entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Snow level lowering to 1500 metres overnight. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 6:24 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to 1200 metres in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:24 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to near valley bottom near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 6:24 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
